channel.title: Zurich 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Zurich 2025 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Benedict Cumberbatch to Receive Zurich’s Golden Eye Award
item.description: The British actor, famed for his roles in ‘Sherlock,’ ‘Doctor Strange,’ and ‘The Power of the Dog,’ will attend the festival and take part in a masterclass.
